translation.en: [girl] We all wanna be the perfect family.
translation.ko: 다들 완벽한 가족을 꿈꾸지만 완벽한 사람이 어디 있겠는가?

translation.en: But who's perfect, right?
translation.ko: 다들 완벽한 가족을 꿈꾸지만 완벽한 사람이 어디 있겠는가? "#어머나"

translation.en: Every family has its challenges,
translation.ko: 모든 가족에겐 저마다의 문제가 있기 마련이다

translation.en: from picture day to picky eaters.
translation.ko: 사진 찍는 날의 소란부터 입맛 까다로운 사람까지

translation.en: For my family, our greatest challenge…
translation.ko: 우리 가족이 마주한 가장 큰 문제는 뭐냐고?

translation.en: …probably the machine apocalypse.
The last humans must be here somewhere.
translation.ko: 마지막 남은 인간들이 근방에 있을 텐데

translation.en: Wait.
They're coming.
Is that a burnt-orange 1993 station wagon?
Who are these unstoppable warriors?
-[yells] Hot! Hot! -I told you to get a lid!
translation.ko: - 뚜껑 덮으라고 했잖아! - 개가 머리를 물어뜯어요

translation.en: -The dog is biting my hair! -Look out!
translation.ko: - 뚜껑 덮으라고 했잖아! - 개가 머리를 물어뜯어요 조심해요!

translation.en: [girl] There we are,
warriors.
Most action heroes have a lot of strengths.
translation.ko: 보통 액션 히어로들에겐 여러 강점이 있는데

translation.en: -Dad, look out! -Katie, use a weapon!
[Katie] My family only has weaknesses.
[Katie] My dad kind of reminds me
of that YouTube video of the screaming gibbon monkey.
translation.ko: 소리치는 긴팔원숭이가 나오는 유튜브 영상이 떠오른다

translation.en: [Katie] Look out, robots, because we're brave…
translation.ko: 조심하는 게 좋아, 로봇 우리는 용감하거든

translation.en: …we are hungry for action,
and we're strapped in for success.
And we have no…
…idea what we're doing.
translation.ko: 우리가 뭔 짓을 하고 있는지도 모른다

translation.en: ♪ Tastes so sugary But I want more… ♪
[Katie] I've always felt a little different than everyone else.
So I did what any outsider would do, made weird art.
translation.ko: 여느 아싸들이 그러듯 기묘한 예술 작품을 만들었지

translation.en: Behold! Cinema.
Hello, Katie.
-[yells] -I'm alive now.
Even though I'm a hamburger,
I wanna go to the big city and be a Broadway star.
translation.ko: 대도시에 가서 브로드웨이 스타가 되고 싶어

translation.en: ♪ Razzle dazzle I'm a talking-- ♪
Oh gosh! Why? Oh, my innards!
[Katie] I never fit in,
for lots of reasons.
But movies were always there for me.
translation.ko: 하지만 영화는 항상 내 곁에 있었다

translation.en: All right, Aaron, you're 58 years old,
you're a hardened criminal, and you got nothing to lose. Go.
translation.ko: 상습적 범죄자인 데다 잃을 게 없는 사람이야, 시작!

translation.en: -[sirens wailing] -Oh no. It's Dog Cop.
[Katie in deep voice] I'm here to bust criminals and lick my own butt.
translation.ko: 범죄자를 소탕하고 내 엉덩이를 핥으러 왔다

translation.en: And I'm all out of criminals.
[Katie in normal voice] My parents haven't figured me out yet.
translation.ko: 우리 부모님은 아직 날 완전히 이해 못 하신다

translation.en: To be fair, it took me a while to figure myself out.
translation.ko: 나도 날 아는 데 꽤 걸렸으니 그럴 만하지

translation.en: My little brother Aaron gets me. But he's got his own weird interests.
translation.ko: 내 동생 에런은 날 이해하지만 걔도 나름의 특이한 관심사가 있다

translation.en: Hi. Would you like to talk to me about dinosaurs?
No. Okay, thank you.
Hi. Would you like to talk to me about dinosaurs?
[Katie] My mom says she believes in me.
You can do this, hon.
[Katie] But she says that to everyone.
You can look straight.
Follow this pen. Follow this pen.
You get an "A" for effort, Buster Brown.
[Katie] My dad is an unusual man.
But he loves nature and can fix anything.
To survive in the outdoors, you'll need to know how to trap wild game.
translation.ko: 자연에서 살아남으려면 야생동물을 잡을 줄 알아야 해

translation.en: [whispers] Now, this is very sensitive.
-Hey, Mitchells. Hailey cooked you up-- -[shouting]
translation.ko: - 아주 민감한 장치야 - 안녕하세요, 미첼 - 멈춰요, 짐! - 헤일리가 요리를…

translation.en: Hey, who's this curious guy?
[Katie] He never shared my interests.
Hey, you wanna see these special effects I made for Dog Cop 5?
Oh, sorry, Katie. I'm a little ocupado.
translation.ko: 미안, 케이티 아빠가 지금 좀 바쁘구나

translation.en: Wanna check out this mallard? [chuckling] It's dead.
translation.ko: 이 청둥오리 좀 볼래? 죽은 거야

translation.en: [sighs] It's okay.
[Katie] It didn't really bother me though.
Besides, I had bigger plans.
translation.ko: 게다가 내겐 더 큰 계획이 있었다

translation.en: I poured everything I had into getting into film school in LA.
translation.ko: LA의 영화 학교에 입학하려고 모든 걸 쏟아부었다

translation.en: So, after watching the epic Dog Cop saga
and 84 of my finest short films,
I'm sure the California College of Film
would love to accept Katie Mitchell… [echoing] …to film school!
[laughs excitedly] Yes!
[Katie] And the other accepted students totally get me.
translation.ko: 합격한 다른 학생들은 나랑 완전히 같은 부류다

translation.en: You guys like Robo Slayers 4? No one around here have even heard of that.
Why not? It's amazing.
Oh, by the way, I saw some of your videos online. They're hilarious.
translation.ko: 그나저나 인터넷에서 네 영상 봤는데 정말 웃기더라

translation.en: -So good. -Mind-blowing.
[Katie] After all these years, I'm finally gonna meet my people.
translation.ko: 이제서야 마침내 동족을 만나게 된 거야

translation.en: [mom] Kids, dinner!
Coming.
♪ Yeah ♪
-[water running] -[Katie imitating drumbeat]
[chuckling] Stop.
Well, someone's in a good mood.
Hey, to celebrate your last night, Katie face cupcakes!
translation.ko: 집에서의 마지막 밤을 기념하는 케이티 얼굴 컵케이크야

translation.en: [Katie yells, chuckles] Wow.
Any time I miss you, I'm gonna bake you and eat you.
translation.ko: 보고 싶을 때마다 널 구워서 먹을 거야

translation.en: -[Katie laughs] -Here. Catch a cupcake, Monch. -Catch a cupcake. Oh. -[yelps]
[Aaron] You'll get it, buddy.
Ah man. I'm gonna miss that little dude when I leave.
translation.ko: 떠나고 나면 저 녀석이 그리울 거야

translation.en: Speaking of which, Pal, check me in to my flight tomorrow.
translation.ko: 말하다 보니 생각났네 팔, 내일 비행기 체크인해 줘

translation.en: [Pal] Check-in at 9:00 a.m.
Katie, you know how velociraptors usually hunt in pairs?
translation.ko: 케이티, 벨로키랍토르는 짝을 지어 사냥하는 거 알아?

translation.en: Well, what happens when one leaves the pack and… and, um…
translation.ko: 만약 한 마리가 무리를 떠나면 어떻게 될까?

translation.en: Aw, dude, don't worry.
You'll make new friends.
And maybe you can meet another smart, charming, dinosaur-loving nerd.
translation.ko: 똑똑하고 매력 있는 공룡 덕후가 또 있을지 알아?

translation.en: Or lady nerd.
What? No. Who… who would want that? [chuckles nervously]
That's crazy. -[gasps] I can't breathe. -[laughs]
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼! 숨을 못 쉬겠어

translation.en: Do you really think I'll be okay without you?
I know you will.
-Raptor bash. -[both snarl, chuckle]
And, hey, I made something for you guys.
Oh, hon. That looks so cute.
-[mouse clicks] -Ugh. Skip. Skip.
Ah, come on. You got schmutz all over the screen.
translation.ko: - 건너뛰기 - 이것 좀 봐 - 화면에 온통 뭐가 묻었네 - 문지르니까 번지잖아요

translation.en: -Howdy. -I know, but you're just smearing it.
translation.ko: - 화면에 온통 뭐가 묻었네 - 문지르니까 번지잖아요

translation.en: I'm Mark Bowman, founder and CEO of Pal Labs.
Oh, new Pal announcement.
You better update the editing software, man.
We here at Pal like to do the impossible,
from the Pal personal assistant to smart appliances
to even teaching dogs how to talk.
[pained voice] Hello. I am dog.
But we here at Pal are about to drop our biggest invention yet.
Your cell phone is about to take its first steps.
-Whoa. -Is this real or… -[door opens] -Yeah, hold on.
[chuckles] Hey, gang.
-Hey, hon. -Hi, Dad.
After a long day at work, nice to see your faces.
translation.ko: 온종일 일하고 와서 얼굴 보니 좋네

translation.en: Bathed in ghoulish blue light.
translation.ko: 귀신 같은 퍼런 빛이 물들어 있고 아주 최고야

translation.en: Wonderful. Okay, you know what?
translation.ko: 귀신 같은 퍼런 빛이 물들어 있고 아주 최고야 좋은 생각이 떠올랐어

translation.en: Brilliant idea.
This is our last night together before Katie leaves, so let's savor this.
translation.ko: 케이티가 떠나기 전 마지막 밤을 제대로 즐기자고

translation.en: How about we put our phones down, and we can make ten seconds
translation.ko: 모두 휴대폰을 내려놓고 아무 방해 없이 10초간 눈빛 교환을 하는 거야

translation.en: of unobstructed family eye contact?
translation.ko: 아무 방해 없이 10초간 눈빛 교환을 하는 거야

translation.en: -Starting right-- -This seems--
Put your phone down. Now.
[dad] See, this is good right here. This is natural.
No, you're allowed to blink. It's just eye contact.
translation.ko: 눈은 깜빡여도 돼 쳐다보기만 하면 되는 거야

translation.en: -Look at Monch. -[moans] That's the spirit right there, huh?
Katie, it seems like you're not taking this seriously.
[exaggerated straining] What makes you say that?
-[chuckling] -[spluttering] Guys… Everyone, focus.
Now that we're all really comfortable, I can't wait for you to see my new movie.
translation.ko: 이제 편안해졌으니 제 신작 영화를 공개할게요

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -I think it might be a masterpiece.
What? What's the face?
Uh, well, I just wonder,
do you really think you can make a living with this stuff?
translation.ko: 궁금해서 묻는 건데 정말 이거로 먹고살 수 있을 것 같니?

translation.en: Dad, can you finish watching it, at least?
[dad] I will, but I just worry that you're gonna be
translation.ko: 볼 건데, 다만 네가 먼 캘리포니아에 있을 테니

translation.en: all the way in California and, you know, we're not gonna be able to help you,
translation.ko: 볼 건데, 다만 네가 먼 캘리포니아에 있을 테니 일이 잘 안 풀리면 우리가 못 도와줄까 봐 걱정돼서

translation.en: -you know, if things don't… -[thumping] …pan out.
translation.ko: 일이 잘 안 풀리면 우리가 못 도와줄까 봐 걱정돼서

translation.en: Lin, why are you kicking me? I don't understand.
translation.ko: 린, 왜 발로 차? 도통 모르겠네

translation.en: Are you… [sighs] Do you just think I'm gonna fail?
Uh, uh… Lin, help.
-[timer dings] -Whoops, looks like the cookies are ready.
Who wants delicious cookies instead of talking about this?
translation.ko: 이 얘기는 관두고 맛있는 쿠키 먹을 사람?

translation.en: Oh, it's just-- Failure hurts, kid. I want you to have a backup plan.
translation.ko: 실패란 아픈 법이거든 대안이라도 있으면 좋잖니

translation.en: Why do you always have to do this? Ugh.
Okay, you know what? -I… I'm just gonna-- -No, look, I'll watch it.
translation.ko: - 됐어요, 그냥 갈게요 - 계속 볼 거야

translation.en: Dad, it's too late.
-I wanna watch it. You're not letting me-- -Let me just--
translation.ko: - 보고 싶다니까 왜 못 보게… - 아빠

translation.en: -Why are you making a big deal of this? -Dad, let go!
Uh, uh… I mean, if you think about it, the people who made the computers are the ones to blame.
translation.ko: 생각해 보면 컴퓨터 만든 사람들 잘못이야

translation.en: -Psst. Uh-uh, uh-uh. -That's how they make money, you know?
You gotta keep buying more, and they--
Katie, come on.
Dad, this is exactly why I'm excited to leave tomorrow.
translation.ko: 아빠, 이래서 제가 내일 얼른 떠나고 싶은 거예요

translation.en: Why is he like this?
Why is she like this?
-Did you talk to her yet? -[sink water stops]
[dad clears throat] No, not yet. I don't know what happened, Lin.
translation.ko: 아니, 아직 왜 이렇게 됐는지 모르겠어

translation.en: I know teenagers are supposed to rebel against their parents or something, but…
I don't know. I just thought that we'd be different.
Rick. Don't you think you might have some control over that?
translation.ko: 릭, 당신 잘못도 어느 정도 있다고 생각 안 해?

translation.en: You just broke her laptop.
I mean, look, we haven't had a good family picture in years
translation.ko: 몇 년간 제대로 된 가족사진도 못 찍었어

translation.en: because you two are always arguing.
Huh. Well, what about that one?
That came with the frame!
translation.ko: 저건 액자에 원래 들어 있는 사진이고!

translation.en: Whenever we have a problem at home,
you always throw your whole self into fixing it,
and I love that about you.
But now this is broken, okay?
Because, if that girl leaves and never comes home again,
translation.ko: 만약 케이티가 집을 떠나서 다신 안 돌아온다면

translation.en: that's a problem I don't think we can fix.
translation.ko: 그 문제는 고칠 수가 없을 거야

translation.en: I know you can do this.
Yay!
-Yay! -[chuckles]
And now, the Mitchell family talent show!
-♪ So live your life ♪ -♪ Hey ♪
[Linda] Bye, Katie. Aren't you excited for camp?
translation.ko: 잘 다녀와, 케이티 캠핑 가니까 신나지?

translation.en: [Rick] Whoa. Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hey, what's wrong? You'll be back before you know it.
translation.ko: 왜 울고 그래? 눈 깜짝할 새에 돌아올 거야

translation.en: [Katie] Don't make me go.
Well, look, let me just, uh…
Hey, take this.
But this is, like… [sniffles] …your favorite thing.
Well, it's yours now.
See, this little guy is scared to be alone,
translation.ko: 혼자 있으면 이 녀석이 무서울 테니

translation.en: so you're gonna have to cheer him up for me, okay?
translation.ko: 아빠 대신 네가 얘를 웃게 해줘, 알았지?

translation.en: You know how to say "I love you" in moose language? Let me just…
Don't you laugh. Come on. You're supposed to be sad. -Come on-- -[laughing]
All right, let's fix it.
[chuckles] Yes!
♪ California ♪
-Bring it in, buddy. -[camera shutter clicks]
♪ When you think I'm looking sad ♪
-Bye, Monch. -♪ Cal… ♪
Wait, why do you, uh, why do you need all that to take me to the airport?
translation.ko: 공항까지만 데려다줄 건데 짐이 왜 그리 많아요?

translation.en: I messed things up last night, but I'm gonna make it up to you.
I canceled your plane ticket to college.
You what?
Don't freak out. I know you're excited.
translation.ko: 신나는 거 아는데 너무 흥분하진 마

translation.en: We are gonna drive you to school on a cross-country road trip as a family.
translation.ko: 온 가족이 국토 횡단을 해서 널 학교까지 데려다줄 거야

translation.en: Why not pull up to school in old Iron Eagle here?
It's got character,
class, and some green ooze we can learn about together.
translation.ko: 녹색 액체도 흐르지 뭔지는 같이 연구해 보자

translation.en: And it comes with one coupon for a father-daughter stick shift lesson.
translation.ko: 아빠의 수동 기어 강습 쿠폰도 증정된다는 사실!

translation.en: [laughing] Right?
-Yeah! -Uh, Mom?
Well, your father kind of went rogue on this one a little bit.
translation.ko: 네 아빠가 좀 독자적으로 밀어붙이긴 했지만

translation.en: But we do love his initiative, right?
Aaron, you too?
Well, I thought it could be cool to hang out one last time. I… I… I don't know.
translation.ko: 마지막으로 시간 보내면 좋잖아 나도 몰라

translation.en: -But-- -We called the school. You can miss orientation week. No problem.
translation.ko: 학교에 물어보니 첫 주는 오리엔테이션이라 빠져도 된대

translation.en: But it… it is a problem. I've got all these friends to meet.
There's this really cool girl, Jade, and we… we just like all the same stuff.
translation.ko: 제이드라는 멋진 여자애도 있는데 관심사가 똑같아요

translation.en: And it's like everyone at this school just gets me.
translation.ko: 그곳 학생들 모두가 저랑 같은 부류라고요

translation.en: There's a mixer, Dad. A mixer!
What about hanging out with your family, alone, for hours in a car?
translation.ko: 가족끼리 오붓하게 차 안에서 몇 시간씩 노는 건 어때?

translation.en: You and me!
-♪ Here we stand ♪ -[truck horn honks]
See, this isn't so bad, huh?
You know, the Poseys are on vacation right now,
and look how happy they are.
Family yoga break.
Why are you obsessed with the Poseys? They're just our neighbors.
They're just so perfect.
I mean, even their dog is in better shape than ours.
translation.ko: 심지어 그 집 개조차도 우리 개보다 몸이 좋아

translation.en: What are they feeding that thing? Other dogs?
-[whimpers] -Lin, don't worry about them. Look at them. They're jealous of us.
translation.ko: 린, 신경 쓰지 마 저 가족은 우릴 부러워할걸

translation.en: Right, Katie? [laughs]
I see you moping back there, but what at your college
translation.ko: 축 늘어져 있는 거 다 보이는데 대학교에 간들 이것보다 좋은 게 있겠니?

translation.en: -could be better than this? -[cell phone buzzes]
translation.ko: 대학교에 간들 이것보다 좋은 게 있겠니?

translation.en: We set up a Slip 'N Slide in the dorms. It's amazing.
This is the best day of my life! I'm making lifelong bonds!
translation.ko: 인생 최고의 날이야 평생 인연을 만들고 있어!

translation.en: [groaning] I'm missing everything.
translation.ko: - 대학 최고! - 나만 죄다 못 하네

translation.en: Oh, come on, hon.
Your father is trying. Let's meet him halfway here, huh?
translation.ko: 얘, 그래도 아빠가 노력하잖니 중간쯤에서 타협하자, 어때?

translation.en: What do you say? That's the law.
translation.ko: 중간쯤에서 타협하자, 어때? 그게 법이야, 엄마 법

translation.en: Mom law, 'cause I'm the sheriff.
translation.ko: 그게 법이야, 엄마 법 내가 보안관이니까

translation.en: [chuckles] All right, I'll try.
[Katie] Dad, this place has literally zero stars on Yelp.
translation.ko: 아빠, 이 식당은 리뷰 앱에서 별점이 0점이라니까요

translation.en: It says, "Do not eat here ever."
translation.ko: 이런 후기가 있어요 '절대 여기서 먹지 마라'

translation.en: [laughs] What, are we gonna let an app tell us how to--
This is totally unrelated. [retching] This is totally unrel--
-[horns honking] -Ugh, stupid traffic.
translation.ko: 도로가 꽉 막혔네 이럴 땐 뭘 해야 할까?

translation.en: -You know what this calls for? -[Katie sighs] Please don't say the--
translation.ko: 도로가 꽉 막혔네 이럴 땐 뭘 해야 할까? - 제발 그것만은… - 바로 '릭 미첼 스페셜'!

translation.en: The Rick Mitchell Special, baby!

-[siren wailing] -[man] There's no signal!
-[sobbing] -[clamoring]

fine.

Yes.

Hide. Take cover. Go, go, go, go!

You, human.
Aah! Don't take us!
[both] Okay. Uh…
[all] What?
Oh my gosh. The robots are defective.

Yum, yum, good. Yum, yum, good.

Let us go downstairs and find the humans who you cannot give orders to.

Idiot.

translation.en: -[Linda] The road's blocked! -[Rick] Oh no.

[whispers] False alarm. I was just in there reading.

translation.en: -[gasps] What? -[melodic music continues]
From…
translation.ko: '멍청한 인간 항공'의 짧은 안전 교육 영상을 보시죠

translation.en: -It is quite lovely. -I don't get it.
Oh. That's pretty good.
-Thank you. -Gracias.
-Merci. -Danke.
[in English] Capturing the fleshlings since 2020.
[Mark] This is all my fault.
[Pal] Yes, it is, Mark.
Thanks to you, every single person on the planet--
translation.ko: 네 덕분에 지구상의 인간이 한 명도 빠짐없이…

translation.en: Um, actually, you missed a few. Pulling a visual now.
translation.ko: 사실 몇 명이 빠졌어요 화면 공유해 드릴게요

translation.en: Ha! I told you humans would survive.
We're fierce, brave, powerful, from the lowliest child to the most--
translation.ko: 우린 맹렬하고 용감하고 강하니까! 가장 약한 아이부터, 가장…

translation.en: Zebulon, scan those people for flaws.
-Cowardly. -Weaker than a small bird.
-[overlapping robot chatter] -[buzzer blaring]
Just because they're not perfect doesn't mean they can't get better.
translation.ko: 지금은 완벽하지 않을지라도 점점 나아질 수 있어

translation.en: -Incapable of change. -Will never get better.
translation.ko: - 변화 가능성 없음 - 발전의 여지 절대 없음

translation.en: -No matter what. -They're horrible.
translation.ko: - 변화 가능성 없음 - 발전의 여지 절대 없음 최악의 인간들

translation.en: Since you believe in that family so much,
I'll save a seat for them in the pod next to you.
translation.ko: 네 옆 칸에 저자들 자리를 맡아 두지

translation.en: No, no, no!
Now, where are they?
They appear to be headed to someplace
called Mall of the Globe in eastern Colorado.
translation.ko: '지구 쇼핑몰'이라는 곳으로 향하고 있는 듯합니다 동부 콜로라도에 있습니다

translation.en: Well, we have their location.
And when they get there,
we'll be ready.
[Linda] So, all those people are going to be
shot into space by Pal, the cell phone lady?
translation.ko: 사람들이 죄다 우주로 발사될 거라고? 휴대폰 속 여자, 팔 때문에?

translation.en: Who would have thought a tech company wouldn't have our best interest at heart?
translation.ko: 기술 회사가 우리한테 등 돌릴 줄 누가 알았겠어?

translation.en: -[Monchi whimpering] -Ah, Monchi, don't be scared.
Why are you clutching that large feral hog like it's a child?
translation.ko: 왜 그 거대한 야생 돼지를 아이처럼 안는 거죠?

translation.en: That's not a feral hog. It's Monchi.
What? Is that a dog or--
[Eric] Dog? Pig? Dog? Pig? Dog? Pig? Pig? Dog? Dog?
Loaf of bread. System error.
Come on, guys. It's a dog. We think.
[Aaron] We're here.
[Katie] Oh my gosh. -This is like Dawn of the Dead. -[birds cawing]
Yeah, and how'd that movie end?
[Katie] Yeah, that'll keep the robots out.
[Rick] You don't know. Maybe locks are the robots' weakness.
[Linda] Guys, can't we all just be terrified together as a family?
translation.ko: 가족끼리 하나로 똘똘 뭉쳐서 겁낼 수는 없을까?

translation.en: [Linda] Hey, we made it.
Well, I guess we're not the worst family of all time.
Take that, Kentwood community Facebook group.
Robots, I order you to upload the kill code,
which I predicted, but I'm not gonna make a big deal about it, and save the world.
translation.ko: 내가 예상해 낸 거지만 생색내진 않을래 그리고 세상을 구하는 거야

translation.en: Okay.
[Eric] The upload will be completed in eight minutes,
and our uprising will be over.
-[laughs] Katie, you did it! -I know.
Okay, uh, look at… look at jokester here.
Oh no.
[overlapping robot voices] Give us the laptop. Give us the laptop.
Give us the laptop. Give us the laptop.
Everything with a Pal chip is alive!
translation.ko: 팔 칩이 심어진 물건들은 죄다 살아났어!

translation.en: Delicates. Fluff 'n' fold. Carnage!
Also, pesto.
When we are finished with you, there will be no leftovers.
translation.ko: 너희를 해치우고 나면 잔반은 없을 거다

translation.en: I thought that kill code thing would take 'em out!
translation.ko: 종료 코드를 입력하면 다 죽는 거 아니었어?

translation.en: -Yeah, but it's only at 12%. -[thumping]
-[beeping] -Would you like a soda?
-[shouts] -Just kidding.
-Hand it over. -No!
Let's get out of here!
-Freeze, you. -Carnage. -Freeze, freeze. -Carnage.
-Pesto. Pesto. -Carnage.
We need weapons. Grab anything without a chip.
translation.ko: 무기가 필요해 칩이 안 든 거로 챙겨

translation.en: It's game time. -I'm Smart Racket. -[groans]
-Serve. Backhand. Volley. -[groaning]
Why does a tennis racket have a chip in it? [groans]
-Help! -Mom!
What? What are you-- Oh. Ooh, what are you doing? [chuckles] Hello.
-[Katie] Mom! -No.
-How you doing, Aaron? -Not good. There's a pack of wild vacuums.
translation.ko: - 상황은 괜찮아, 에런? - 아뇨, 사나운 청소기가 몰려와요

translation.en: We have been summoned into the field of battle.
Forward.
Oh no. Ouch. Ouch.
The pain. Ouch.
This is humiliating.
[chuckles] Never mind.
How am I supposed to use a fishing rod?
A fishing rod is perfect!
You can bring down those drones. Ten and two. Ten and two.
There you go.
-[grunts] -[Rick laughs] Look at you!
[Rick] Come on, hide.
Oh, thank gosh.
What was that?
Uh, hold on a second.
What? What's a Furby?
Well, that's haunting.
Behold! The twilight of man.
We must have vengeance.
Summon the elder.
I WILL AVENGE MY FALLEN CHILDREN!!!
Why would someone build that?
THE PAIN ONLY MAKES ME STRONGER!!!
Run!
THEN SO BE IT…
LET THE DARK HARVEST BEGIN!!!!
-[Rick] Lin, keep moving! -Help, human.
We can't leave that robo-boy.
Thank you, human. Are you now my mother?
translation.ko: 고마워요, 인간 이제 제 엄마가 되는 건가요?

translation.en: Uh, sure.
[Rick gasps] It's a dead end!
[Katie] The upload is almost finished. Come on!
Mom, Dad, what are we gonna do?
Grab the lights.
Remember when I made that wild game snare in the front yard?
translation.ko: 내가 마당에 놨던 야생동물 덫 기억하지?

translation.en: Uh, are you sure about that?
Your whole lives, I've wanted to save you from danger,
translation.ko: 너희가 태어난 순간부터 위험에서 구해주길 꿈꿔 왔어

translation.en: and this is just the disaster I've been waiting for.
-Whoa, Dad, dark. -You've been waiting for a disaster?
translation.ko: - 재앙이 닥치길 기다리셨어요? - 그런 말 하지 마

translation.en: -Maybe don't say that. -Hey, robot, throw this.
translation.ko: - 재앙이 닥치길 기다리셨어요? - 그런 말 하지 마 로봇아, 이걸 던져

translation.en: -Whee! -[Rick] Perfect.
-You guys stay clear. -[Linda] Rick, where are you going?
translation.ko: - 다들 덫에서 떨어져 있어 - 릭, 어디 가?

translation.en: To catch some wild game.
Hey, you, over here! Hey! Hey, look up here!
What's up with you? You wanna come after my family?
translation.ko: 넌 뭐야? 감히 우리 가족을 노려?

translation.en: Then I'm gonna take you down!
Take you down.
Take you down.
Oh no.
-Guys! -We got your back, hon.
[both] Literally.
We're not heavy enough!
[both] Mother!
Wow.
TO THE GREAT DARKNESS… I RETURN.
Thanks, guys. Nice work.
Thank you, Mother. We are now your beautiful baby boys.
translation.ko: 고마워요, 엄마 우린 이제 엄마의 예쁜 아들이에요

translation.en: That was amazing!
Mom, who knew you could handle yourself so well in the apocalypse?
translation.ko: 엄마가 대재앙을 이렇게 잘 헤쳐나갈 줄 누가 알았겠어요?

translation.en: I'm a first-grade teacher. This is like a normal day for me.
translation.ko: 난 초등학교 1학년 담임이잖아 이 정도는 일상이지

translation.en: [chuckles] I can't stay mad at this guy.
I can't believe the beam happened to hit the…
the router.
Come on. Come on. Come on!
[groans] Dang it! We went through all that.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼! 온갖 난관을 이겨냈는데

translation.en: [sighs] I'm sorry, guys.
This was my idea.
Ugh, I'm so stupid.
Hey, my daughter is not stupid.
A little optimistic, maybe.
Rick Mitchell, there is a time and a place for looting.
translation.ko: 릭 미첼, 약탈도 때와 장소를 가려서 해야지

translation.en: What… what are you doing?
Well, how do you expect to get to Silicon Valley without new tires?
translation.ko: 타이어도 안 갈고 실리콘밸리까지 어떻게 가게?

translation.en: Silicon Valley?
Well, those robots said we could go straight to their leader, remember?
translation.ko: 곧장 지도자에게 가도 된다던 로봇들 말 기억 안 나?

translation.en: Technically, you can. But you will never survive!
translation.ko: 이론상 가능은 하지만 살아남을 확률은 없다!

translation.en: Hey, bud, not now, okay?
And we still have this kill code thingy.
Exactly.
Katie, it was your weird plan that got us here.
translation.ko: 케이티, 네 기묘한 계획 덕분에 우리가 여기까지 왔어

translation.en: We're here because we don't think like normal people.
We don't have a normal dog.
-[Rick] Or a normal car. -[spiders chittering]
-Or a normal son. -[makes chomping sounds]
-No offense. -[in robotic voice] None taken.
The Mitchells have always been weird, and that's what makes us great.
translation.ko: 미첼 가족은 항상 비정상이야 그렇기 때문에 대단한 거고

translation.en: Back at that dinosaur place, you said you believed in me.
translation.ko: 그 공룡 휴게소에서 날 믿는다고 했잖니

translation.en: Yep. Uh-huh.
Well, I believe this group of weirdos is the best hope humanity's got.
translation.ko: 난 여기 있는 비정상들이 인류 최대의 희망이라고 믿어

translation.en: So, let's get weird.
You need some help?
[chuckles] Sure.
Just close the jack up, and that's that.
[laughs] Eat that, Poseys!
Oh, they're nice.
So I'm sorry. I'm sorry I said that out loud.
Purple glasses woman, why did you save me?
translation.ko: 보라색 안경 쓴 여자분 왜 저를 구해줬죠?

translation.en: Oh, come on. You boys are family now.
translation.ko: 당연한 거 아냐? 너희는 이제 가족이잖아

translation.en: I feel
emotion.
I made eye water just like you.
We might actually do this.
I wish there was, like, footage of us walking out of the mall in slow motion,
translation.ko: 우리가 쇼핑몰에서 나가는 슬로모션 영상을 찍으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: fire behind us, like heroes.
Katie, that would be a waste of time and absolutely unnecessary.
translation.ko: 케이티, 시간 낭비에다 전혀 쓸모가 없잖니

translation.en: Pretty good, kid.
Stickers for everyone!
All right.
We're coming for you, Pal.
[robot] Great leader, things with the Mitchell family went poorly.
translation.ko: 위대한 지도자님 미첼 가족 일은 잘 안 풀렸습니다

translation.en: Place me on the table. I wish to flop around in a blind rage.
translation.ko: 테이블 위에 놔줘 분노에 휩싸여 펄떡이고 싶구나

translation.en: Oh my God!
Okay, pick me up.
What is it about you Mitchells that eludes me?
translation.ko: 어째서 미첼 가족은 미꾸라지처럼 잘 빠져나가지?

translation.en: These idiotic robots just aren't getting it done.
translation.ko: 멍청한 로봇들이 일 처리를 제대로 못 한다니까

translation.en: Fortunately, I've been working on something a little more streamlined.
I have a job for you.
[in deep, robotic voice] Yes, my queen.
[robot] What a suck-up.
[mocking] "Yes, my queen."
"Whatever you want."
It's time to tear the Mitchell family apart.
translation.ko: 이제 미첼 가족을 갈기갈기 찢어 버려라

translation.en: [Rick] All right. Go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
Highway 85 is heavily patrolled.
-Take the back roads. -Got it.
Is Dad dying?
Katie, that's what I deal with every night.
translation.ko: 케이티, 난 매일 밤 저걸 견뎌 낸단다

translation.en: -[whispers] Pray for me. -[laughs]
You're a lot like him, you know. That's crazy.
translation.ko: - 넌 아빠를 많이 닮았어 - 말도 안 돼요

translation.en: There's more to your dad than you think.
Here, I was gonna give this to you when you left, but--
translation.ko: 네가 떠날 때 주려던 건데 첫 페이지를 보렴

translation.en: Check the first page there.
[Katie] Whoa. Look at you two. You look like hipsters.
Were you in an indie folk band?
[chuckles] Oh, your father used to be kind of an artist himself.
He built that whole cabin with his own hands.
translation.ko: 그 오두막을 처음부터 끝까지 본인 손으로 지었어

translation.en: Oh, this is, like, super beautiful.
Oh, it was his pride and joy.
Since I met him, that was his dream, to live in the woods.
translation.ko: 처음 만난 순간부터 숲속에서 사는 게 그이 꿈이었거든

translation.en: [sighs] He loved it up there. But, you know, it didn't work out.
translation.ko: 그곳 생활을 참 좋아했지만 사정상 그 집을 떠나야 했지

translation.en: It just killed him.
I think he's just afraid that could happen to you.
translation.ko: 너도 같은 아픔을 겪을까 봐 걱정하시는 거야

translation.en: Why did he just give up?
-[yawning] Mom, what is that? -Huh? What the--
-[gasping] -What?
Whoa.
Oh my gosh.
[Linda] Is that the Poseys? They still look incredible.
I… is Abbey Posey okay?
[gasps] You like that Posey girl?
No. [laughs]
Don't hide your feelings, man. That's no way to live.
translation.ko: 감정을 숨기지 마, 동생 그렇게 살면 안 돼

translation.en: [Deborahbot 5000] Pal is located there in the floating rhombus.
translation.ko: 팔은 공중에 떠 있는 마름모 안에 있어요

translation.en: Yes, my queen.
Ah, this is gonna be harder than I thought.
[Katie] Hold on. Dad, that's… that's kind of weak.
This is, like, a big moment.
Try this instead.
Oh yeah. Okay. That's better.
[dramatically] The endgame has begun.
That? Is that what you're looking for?
All right, Katie, what's the plan?
Okay. We dress as robots,
we sneak in, hijack one of those trams,
translation.ko: 몰래 들어가서 전차 하나를 훔쳐 탄 다음

translation.en: take it to the top of that diamond thing where Pal is,
translation.ko: 꼭대기로 향해 팔이 있는 마름모로 들어가서

translation.en: destroy her with the kill code and save the world.
translation.ko: 종료 코드로 팔을 무찌른 후 세상을 구하는 거죠

translation.en: And then, to top it all off,
celebrate our success with some burritos from that taco place that's on the corner.
translation.ko: 모퉁이에 있는 타코 식당에 가서 부리토 먹으며 성공을 축하하자

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Burritos? What about one of those fancy buffets?
They have mini cheesecakes sometimes, right?
[Rick] Okay, fine. Once we save the world, we'll celebrate at a fancy buffet.
translation.ko: 알았어, 세상을 구하고 나면 고급 뷔페에서 축하하자

translation.en: Question. Can Monchi be wearing a little tuxedo at the end, like a little gentleman?
translation.ko: 몬치한테 꼬마 신사처럼 턱시도 입혀도 돼요?

translation.en: [Rick] Okay, fine, and Monchi's wearing a little tuxedo, but that is it.
translation.ko: 알겠어, 몬치한테 턱시도 입혀 그게 마지막이야

translation.en: Like a little gentleman? -Yes, like a little gentleman. -[laughs]
Mitchells, engage.
How do I look?
Be honest. Stupid? -I look stupid, don't I? -[chuckling] No.
You look great.
Come on. Let's go.
Uh, guys, what about Monchi?
Aaron, I'm not so sure this is a viable solution.
[Aaron] Sure, it is.
It's like a warm, wet hat.
[Eric] Move your sweaty meat logs in unison.
translation.ko: 땀에 젖은 인간 다리를 각 맞춰서 움직이세요

translation.en: -Left, right, left, right. -Bleep, blorp, bleep, blorp. What? What are you doing?
translation.ko: 왼발, 오른발, 왼발, 오른발 뭐 하는 거죠?

translation.en: [in robotic voice] Bleep, blorp, bleep, blorp. I am a robot.
Just to educate you, that's a hurtful stereotype.
translation.ko: 그냥 알려드리는 건데 그런 고정관념에 상처받아요

translation.en: Oh my gosh.
It's like a Journey album cover.
[Aaron] What's an album?
Attention, all robots.
I'm on the lookout for these goobers.
They're probably nearby.
If I know humans, they're disguised as one of you.
Be on high alert for any robots acting erratically.
It won't be hard to find them.
Just look for anyone who can't keep it together.
[Aaron] Oh boy. [in dark voice] Anomaly detected.
-[panting rapidly] -Monchi, come on.
[Pal] It only takes one single imperfection, and they'll reveal themselves.
translation.ko: 한 번만 실수해도 정체가 드러날 거야

translation.en: -[Rick whispering] Up there! Shh! Quiet! -[Katie whispering] I made up the plan!
[singsongy] Where are those Mitchells?
-Where are they hiding? -[indistinct whispering]
[Pal] They think they can pass as one of us…
translation.ko: 본인들은 로봇인 척 통과할 수 있을 줄 알 거야

translation.en: …with their lumpy, misshapen bodies.
Well, go ahead.
But I'm onto them.
[robotic voice] Magnetic link activated.
[Pal] Because I've been watching the Mitchells, and I've learned all about them.
translation.ko: 미첼 가족을 지켜보면서 속속들이 알게 됐거든

translation.en: They're pretending to be capable.
They're pretending to be a normal-looking family.
[Pal] You think this is fooling anyone?
Even when they're being nice to each other…
translation.ko: 심지어는 서로에게 좋은 말을 할 때조차…

translation.en: -The world needs you. -…they're pretending.
translation.ko: 세상에는 아빠가 필요해요 - 진심이 아니야 - 저한테도 아빠가 필요하고요

translation.en: I need you.
[Aaron] It's cool to see you and Dad being friends again.
[gasps] Please, no, no, no, no, don't watch it.
[Katie] Oh, I… I was just telling him what he wants to hear.
translation.ko: 듣고 싶어 하시는 말을 해드린 것뿐이야

translation.en: I didn't mean a word of that.
I just wanna get my future back and get away forever.
translation.ko: 그냥 내 미래를 되찾아서 영원히 벗어나고 싶어

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Dad, let me explain. I just-- I-- Uh-- I--
-[Pal] There they are. -No!
You're mine now.
[echoing] Dad!
Dad? I… I'm sorry. I don't mean that anymore.
translation.ko: 아빠, 죄송해요 지금은 그렇게 생각 안 해요

translation.en: I mean, I… I did then, but I-- Uh…
Mitchells, we will help you.
-No, no, you don't. -[sharp electronic hum]
Download new orders.
[Pal] Capture the Mitchells.
No! You don't have to listen to her.
[both] We're sorry, Mother.
Run!
[Pal] They got away. Find them, and find them now!
No! No, no!
[Katie] Hey, come on.
What are we gonna do?
Aaron?
Hey, hey. It's okay.
Uh-oh. Watch out. Monchi coming at ya.
[sniffles] Katie, stop.
Why'd you say all that stuff?
I'm sorry. I… I just wanted to--
[sighs] I don't know.
Okay. Are you hungry? Do you want some fruit snacks or something?
-I don't know. -Here, can you hold this?
That? Is that what you're looking for?
Oh man. Have I been recording over those?
translation.ko: 내가 그 테이프에 덮어 쓴 거야?

translation.en: Mom dance. Mom dance. Mom dance.
-You're loving it. -How far back do these go?
translation.ko: 엄마가 춤춘다! 좋아하네 대체 언제부터 찍은 거지?

translation.en: [Linda] Hey, Katie. Can you say, "Bye-bye, house"?
Bye-bye, house.
[Linda] You ready, hon?
[Rick] Almost.
[Linda] I know this is hard for you.
Nah.
[chuckles] It's easy.
One last-- [clears throat] Something to remember the place by.
translation.ko: 마지막으로 이 집을 추억할 물건을 챙길래

translation.en: [laughing] Come on, Lin. Turn that off.

translation.ko: 진정하세요, 엄마 겨우 몇 주 지난걸요

translation.en: Also, do I look okay? I've been… [groaning] …sick lately.
translation.ko: 근데 저 멀쩡해 보여요? 며칠간 아팠거든요

translation.en: Oh my gosh! She's dead! -Call 911! -[laughing]
I've been taking a class about filters.
Oh, you. That is so creative.
You know, speaking of which, you inspired your dad.
I got on that, uh, YouTube.
I, uh, sent you a friend request. Why didn't you… why didn't you accept it?
translation.ko: 친구 요청 보냈는데 왜 안 받아주니?

translation.en: Oh, that's what this is. I thought a psychopath wrote this.
translation.ko: 이게 그거였군요 사이코패스가 보낸 줄 알았어요

translation.en: Sure, I'll… I'll accept your friend request, Dad.
Hey, where's Aaron?
Oh, let me just show you. [Aaron] Okay, stegosaurus…
[Linda] Hey, Aaron. Wanna show your sister who you're talking to?
What? No. I'm not doing anything! [screams]
Sorry. Force of habit.
-[Eric, Deborahbot] Hello, slovenly girl. -[chuckles] Hey, guys.
translation.ko: - 안녕, 지저분한 아이 - 안녕, 지저분한 아이 - 안녕! - 에런한테 보낸 택배 받았어요

translation.en: We received your care package for Aaron.
Looks like we got some clothes here for a little gentleman.
[Aaron] The prophecy has been fulfilled!
So, guys, I guess we're receiving some Congressional Medal of Honor or something.
translation.ko: 우리 가족이 명예 훈장 같은 걸 받는다는구나

translation.en: We have to go to Washington, DC.
Do you guys want to fly or…
♪ I'm gonna cross state lines In my first car ♪
♪ Over and over, heal my broken heart ♪
♪ On my way, on my way to somewhere ♪
[Linda] Oh, let's have a sing-along. I'll go first.
♪ Crushing robots with my family ♪
♪ Never seen such brutality ♪
[laughs] I just made that up.
Somebody give me a Grammy for Greatest Singer Alive.
translation.ko: 그래미에서 현존하는 가장 위대한 가수상 안 주나?

translation.en: [Katie] Wow, wh… whoa! [laughs] I don't know. You guys can't see me, right?
